word:
April 26, 1905 "Elmshaven," Sanitarium, Cal.,
March 30, 1905

Dear Brethren and Sisters: 


     I am greatly burdened because the money needed for the completion of our school and sanitarium at Takoma Park, comes in so slowly. The Lord has said that these institutions should be put in working order as soon as possible. We have no time to lose.
